data.title: Andy Goldenberg — Bitter Jester Foundation for the Arts, NFP
data.meta_description: Bio for Andy Goldenberg, Bitter Jester Music Festival Judge.
data.meta_site_name: Bitter Jester Foundation for the Arts, NFP
data.text:
Andy Goldenberg (aka “Goldentusk”)

Bitter Jester Music Festival Judge

Andy Goldenberg is an actor/writer/comedian who is best known for his “Goldentusk” YouTube Channel where he's amassed more than 59 Million views and earned the nickname “The Theme Song Sondheim,” having written and performed his own lyrics to classic movie scores of the last forty years.

In addition, Andy has written several original comedic songs for the Goldentusk Holiday Album and sung on the National Lampoon Lemmings Sketchy Album. He performed weekly in the Second City LA improvised music variety show, Second City Sings, and received the Jerry Herman Musical Theatre Award during his undergraduate program at the University of Miami Theatre Conservatory.

He acted opposite Adam Sandler and Al Pacino in the critically acclaimed film Jack and Jill, wrote a children’s book called Peter, the Paranoid Pumpkin, and has starred in several TV shows, films, and national commercials.
